definition: to aerate/to ventilate
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Add low flow aerators to all the faucets in your home.
sentences.chinese: 把你家里的每个水龙头都装上加气仪。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the research process of AAC ( Autoclaved aerated concrete)bricks exclusive interface agent.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了加气砼砌块专用界面剂的研制过程。

sentences.english: Cooperate with control system in order to realize that several dispensers fueling through one pump.
sentences.chinese: 可配合站控系统实现一泵多机同量加气的功能。

sentences.english: Even an air-entraining agent can be used because the minute pores are discontinuous.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可以使用加气剂，因为小的气孔是不连通的。

sentences.english: When carbon dioxide is artificial join, called gas sparkling wines.
sentences.chinese: 当二氧化碳是人工加入时，称为加气起泡葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Office internal partitions use aerated concrete block, with thickness of 200mm in all.
sentences.chinese: 内部间隔墙均采用200厚加气混凝土砌块砌筑。

sentences.english: Chamber of aerated concrete wall thickness is three to one in five.
sentences.chinese: 气室壁厚度是加气混泥土的三至五分之一。

sentences.english: Cutting machine is the core equipment in production of aerated concrete.
sentences.chinese: 切割机是加气混凝土生产中的核心设备。

sentences.english: This machine is the necessary equipment for hoisting of aerated concrete.
sentences.chinese: 本机是加气混凝土吊装时的必备设备。

definition: taxi/(Tw) rental car
public transport vehicle/town bus/CL:輛|辆[liang4]
taxi/cab (PRC)/hire car (Tw)/CL:輛|辆[liang4]
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
gas station
taxi driver
tanker (truck)
private car
chauffeur/driver/CL:個|个[ge4]
to refuse to take a passenger (of taxi)
aspiration (phonetics, explosion of breath on consonants distinguishing Chinese p, t from b, d)
to run the meter (in a taxi)
fare meter/taximeter
parking spot/unloading point/garage place/stand for taxi
traffic jam/(of traffic) to get congested
(northern dialect) to pick up a fare (as a taxi driver)/to pick up a piece of work (as a courier)
